unnormalised: Hey everyone, crop insurance is super important, right? Especially with the unpredictable weather these days in Maharashtra. My kisan friend, Ramesh, near Pune, almost lost his entire rice crop last year. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped some. What's everyone's experience? Thinking of getting it for my own small land. Wishing everyone a good harvest season! Maybe celebrate with some biryani this Onam.
normalised: Hey everyone, crop insurance is super important, right? Especially with the unpredictable weather these days in Maharashtra. My kisan friend, Ramesh, near Pune, almost lost his entire rice crop last year. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped some. What's everyone's experience?
